name: Mr. Ball
summary: Mr. Ball encounters big trouble on his way home. The wicked witch has laid many obstacles with her sorceries. Can Mr. Ball avoid all obstacles and get home safely? His destiny lies in your hand! You may set Mr. Ball flying with simply a slice on the screen, avoid all the monsters and traps, you will guide Mr. Ball home! Take this fun challenge with your fingertips, show off your dexterity! Break a leg on this fun mini game!
